name: Count Lasher
description: '''Count Lasher''' (sometimes styled '''Count Lasha''') was the stage-name of '''Terence Parkins''' ({{circa|1921}} â€“ 1977), a Jamaican singer and songwriter.  Born in the  mountainous parish of [[Saint Thomas Parish, Jamaica|Saint Thomas]],  Lasher predominantly utilized first rural, and then urban [[mento]] styles in his music, although in later years he recorded some [[ska]] and [[reggae]] singles.  Successful and prolific in output, Count Lasher remains an overlooked figure in the history of [[Music of Jamaica|Jamaican music]].
